pages.text: Phantoms are one of the Strangest Mysteries of this world. Their Flesh clearly possesses some ability to bring about Flight, but no such Power can be captured in the Crucible.
I believe this Residue must contain the unknown Power of Flight... but how to unleash it? There must be $(4)some kind of stinulus$(0) that will bring it out...

$(o)Waiting for Phantoms to appear naturally is a pain. Let me offer an alternative. There is a Power unlike the others, a dark Power which assimilates any other. While Mind is being consumed by it, any death near the Crucible will bring a Phantom about.
